channel.title: Java Heap and Char files emptying
channel.description:
Okay, lately I've been getting some Java Heap Space out of memory shit. Also, it deletes Character files a lot. It doesn't delete the file itself, but deletes everything inside of it. I'm using 317 Delta base. Some of the Java Heap errors: [code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Player.<init>(Player.java:775) at client.<init>(client.java:8701) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:177) at server.run(server.java:291) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:679)
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Player.<init>(Player.java:775) at client.<init>(client.java:8701) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:177) at server.run(server.java:291) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:679) Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at java.nio.HeapByteBuffer.<init>(HeapByteBuffer.java:57) at java.nio.ByteBuffer.allocate(ByteBuffer.java:329) at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.<init>(StreamEncoder.java:194) at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.<init>(StreamEncoder.java:174) at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.forOutputStreamWriter(StreamEncoder.java:58) at java.io.OutputStreamWriter.<init>(OutputStreamWriter.java:111) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(FileWriter.java:63) at client.savegame(client.java:26984) at client.refreshSkills(client.java:8449) at client.process(client.java:25260) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:273) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:679)
[/code]I get a heap like every day and I have to restart the server. It's getting really annoying, I'm going to be gone for like a week on the 7th, and can't keep doing this. Now, could someone help me figure out this? I hear this is a java leak or something. I'm not sure how to fix this, I've been losing players to this. I've been busy with school a lot this month, and can't really do much. Please someone help. :)

item.title: Java Heap and Char files emptying
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Okay, lately I’ve been getting some Java Heap Space out of memory shit. Also, it deletes Character files a lot. It doesn’t delete the file itself, but deletes everything inside of it. I’m using 317 Delta base. Some of the Java Heap errors: [code]Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
at Player.(Player.java:775)
at client.(client.java:8701)
at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:177)
at server.run(server.java:291)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:679)

Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
at Player.(Player.java:775)
at client.(client.java:8701)
at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:177)
at server.run(server.java:291)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:679)
Exception in thread “Thread-7” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
at java.nio.HeapByteBuffer.(HeapByteBuffer.java:57)
at java.nio.ByteBuffer.allocate(ByteBuffer.java:329)
at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.(StreamEncoder.java:194)
at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.(StreamEncoder.java:174)
at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.forOutputStreamWriter(StreamEncoder.java:58)
at java.io.OutputStreamWriter.(OutputStreamWriter.java:111)
at java.io.FileWriter.(FileWriter.java:63)
at client.savegame(client.java:26984)
at client.refreshSkills(client.java:8449)
at client.process(client.java:25260)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:273)
at process.run(process.java:14)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:679)

[/code]I get a heap like every day and I have to restart the server. It’s getting really annoying, I’m going to be gone for like a week on the 7th, and can’t keep doing this. Now, could someone help me figure out this? I hear this is a java leak or something. I’m not sure how to fix this, I’ve been losing players to this. I’ve been busy with school a lot this month, and can’t really do much. Please someone help.

Read full topic
item.source: Java Heap and Char files emptying
